Consultant Services Email 1024x768 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Dave,
Thank you for the follow up! If you have any questions for me in the future please do not hesitate to reach out to me!
Have a great week! Nicolette

Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
From: David Berg [mailto:david.berg@cox.net] Sent: Monday, January 02, 2012 7:14 AM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: RE: MBO Partners / David Berg
Hi Nicolette,
Yes  I have a short term job that is supposed to last til the end of Jan or Mid-Feb. I did mention MBO as a payment option, but the company, AdSTM, preferred to pay me with a 1099 straight to me. I am continuing to look for more short term jobs, hopefully some will prefer to use MBO. Thanks for the info
Dave Berg
From: Nicolette Taylor [mailto:ntaylor@mbopartners.com] Sent: Sunday, January 01, 2012 2:49 PM To: david.berg@cox.net Subject: MBO Partners / David Berg
Hello David,
I wanted to follow up with you from our conversation regarding the services provided by MBO Partners. You mentioned you may be starting a new consulting contract. How is that going?
Here are a few tools that summarize our conversation from before: There are some webinars and videos we have created that might assist you in finding your next contract if you have not already found one: http://www.mbopartners.com/mbo-partners-webcast-index MBO Partners continues to invest in being a leader for independent consultants across the country. I also wanted to share the news that we released a study you may be interested in. For the first time, theres real hard facts about The State of Independence in America that will reveal not just how many millions of independent professionals there are in the country, but also the unique things that motivate them and help them stay happily independent. Any update would be great, look forward to hearing from you.
Regards, Nicolette ___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Enrollment Manager MBO Partners
t: (703) 793-6281 f: 703.793.6081 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
